question: What's the best preworkout supplement?
question_content: For a 160lb man who's been working out for more than a year?

answers.answer_content:
That's going to be quite subjective

I've tried  bunch - some good, some not

Jack3d is good at first but I built up a tolerance to it.  
Hemo Rage Black is ok. 
SciFit Dark Energy is OK.  
Cellucor C4 I liked but its pricey. 
 Gaspari Superpump 250 was good and then they re-forumulated it and called it Superpump Max and I didn't care for it.  
Currently using MuscleTech NeuroCore and liking it.

You have to decide what you want it in it, too - creatine, 1,3 dimethyl, etc.....

well depends on what your looking for

if u want more strength an size then try creatine
if you want more recovery and energy

try drinking Extend.. you drink before and during

and also you can try some Nitric Oxide

but creatine an nitrix oxide u take on an off.. 8-10 weeks on.. 5 weeks off

you dont need to use supplements you can get all of what you need out of foods when working out eat foods high in slow releasing eneargy such as banana and if your weight lifting carbs such as wholemeal pasta and leafy green veg such as spinage.
